first_login:
This is the first time you've logged in to OpenClocking. You can use the following credentials to log in.
Email : manager@openclocking.com
Password: {{password}}
errors_login_credentials: Sorry, but the email address and/or password are incorrect.
errors_change_password_recycled: You cannot reuse your last {{count}} passwords
errors_change_password_wrong_old_passwor: The old password is not valid
errors_missing_fields: Not all fields are filled in.
setup_step_1: Choose the default language for the application
setup_step_2: Choose the name of the organization
setup_footer: This option can be changed later
default_user_password_description: Users will need to change this password upon their first login.
internal_id_required_description: Prevents the creation of a user without an internal identifier
default_permissions_description: Click on one or more permissions to assign them by default
